item.title: Boeing reports results before the bell. Here's what to expect
item.description: Boeing hasn't reported an annual profit since 2018.

item.title: Software giant SAPâ€™s shares surge 10% after first-quarter profit beat
item.description: SAP announced Wednesday that its first-quarter operating profit had risen by 58% year-on-year to hit 2.5 billion euros ($2.9 billion).

item.title: Capital One beats on earnings, flexes momentum ahead of closing Discover deal
item.description: Shares of the credit card issuer rose around 3% in extended trading Tuesday.

item.title: Tesla reports 20% drop in auto revenue as first-quarter results miss Wall Street estimates
item.description: Tesla's first-quarter earnings report lands as investors reckon with a steep slide in the company's stock price.

item.title: Tesla CEO Musk says time he spends on DOGE will drop 'significantly' next month
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on his company's earnings call on Tuesday that he'll spend much less time with DOGE starting in May.
